string.name: intro
string.b: “We, at MentorMitr, meet individuals wherever they are in their journey of career development, and help them reach where they wish to be.”

resources.string: Hello blank fragment
Click the SUBSCRIBE TO WEATHER button below to subscribe to the weather topic. Messages sent to the weather topic will be received. The LOG TOKEN button logs the InstanceID token to logcat.

fcm_default_channel
MentorMitr
Failed to subscribe to MentorMitr topic
Report generated
Open navigation drawer
Close navigation drawer
NEXT
SKIP
GOT IT
TO THE PARTY..
ORDER.EAT.PHIR REPEAT
MentorMitr is a platform which systematically creates a program based approach to enable students and working people to define their goals clearly and follow a method to achieve those predictably.
1. Time Management: To create awareness of optimum time management with discipline.
2. Goals Setting: Setting and implementing a definitive goal to achieve desired ends.
3. Soft Skills: Imparted skills to effectively manage relationships and tasks through training.
4. Emotional Quotient (EQ): It is a measure of your real potential or how resilient you are mentally to cope with your environment.
5. Priority Management: Choosing from a plethora of activities on what to do first and then the order to optimize the outcome.
6. Performance Enhancement: Improving performance optimally is measuring it with discipline and consistency.

1.SWOT Analysis and Counselling Session 1:\n Week 1 - Based on your psychometric and aptitude profile. This includes an online test for which you get a report and counselling with an expert within week 1 of the engagement

2.SWOT Analysis and Counseling Session 2:\n Week 2 - Of your current situation based on a questionnaire which digresses into your day-to-day, routine, accomplishments and aspirations and creates a roadmap.
3.Development of Templates:\nWeek 3 - Customized to your needs that sets the compass
4.Set up a Self-Awareness: Week 4 - Process for self-control
5.More Features: Free access to webinars during the month
6.Our Support: 24X7 Chatbot Facility

1.SWOT Analysis and Counselling Session 1: Month 1 - Based on your psychometric and aptitude profile. This includes an online test for which you get a report and counselling with an expert within one week of the engagement
2.Analysis and Counseling Session 2: Of your current situation based on a questionnaire which digresses into your day-to-day, routine, accomplishments and aspirations and creates a roadmap
3.Development of Templates: Month 2 - Customized to your needs that sets the compass
4.Weekly Report: On your improvement and strength indices generated for self-evaluation and improvement
5.Counselling Session 3: With your personal coach for tweaking the plan if it needs or identifying new things and have your buy-in
6.Assessment Centre: Month 3 - A diagnostic assessment towards the end of the program to reassess if everything that we planned is moving on the tracks
7.Weekly Reports: performance reports on indices

8.Other Support Includes:
-60 Minutes/month Telephonic Counselling: Available (to be scheduled each time).
-Maximum number of sessions - 4 of 15 mins each every month
-24X7 Support via Chatbot
-Free Access to Webinars for 3 months
1.Counselling Session 1: To Identify Strengths and Development Areas - Psychometric Test, Analysis Report and Individual Counseling Session

2.Counselling Session 2: Competitive Ability Mapping done Through an Onboarding Questionnaire to understand the academic ability and social environment so that the student can be counselled efficiently
3.Tracks and Options Template: creating and counselling students for customized course plans to ensure clarity of desired career plans
4.Our Support: 24x7 Chatbot access for 1 month
5.More Features: 1 Month Free To Webinars
1.Counselling Session 1: To Identify Strengths and Development Areas - Psychometric Test, Analysis Report and Individual Counseling Session

2.Counselling Session 2: Competitive Ability Mapping done Through an Onboarding Questionnaire to understand the academic ability and social environment so that the student can be counselled efficiently
3.Tracks and Options Template: Creating and counselling students for customized course plans to ensure clarity of desired career plans

4.Time Tracker: Customized Time tracker maps current activity time , helps enhance your performance through optimisation. Real-time Reports are generated and are available on a weekly basis based on your own inputs and guide you for self-improvement.
5.Real-time Telephonic Session: 60 minutes per month (for 3 months)
6.Monthly Counseling Sessions: 4 Session In Total - 3 with Coach and 1 Expert Coach
7.More Features: Webinar Access for 3 Months
8.Continuous Support: 24X7 Chatbot Facility1
9.Performance Tracking: Via Digital Reports
1.Counselling Session 1: Psychometric Analysis of the student is done through a Standard Test Online to determine their Course and development area.

2.Counselling Session 2: Competitive Ability Mapping done Through an Onboarding Questionnaire to understand the academic ability and social environment so that the student can be counselled efficiently
3.Tracks and Options Template: Based on students ability his various tracks are laid out digitally
4.Time Tracker: Maps students Current and Optimized Time Management and Weekly Reports of Performance
5.Energy and Engagement Measurement: Management of Performance Enhancement while catering to Social and Personal Needs in a Weekly Report
6.EQ and grooming Modules: Through a Daily Feed to reinforce Goals and Affirm through special sessions, webinars, blogs and videos
7.Monthly Personal Structured Counseling: Total 12 Sessions of 1 hour each - Personal Coach so that Monthly Variations and Improvements could be studied for Course Correction.
8.Continuous Support: 24x7 Chatbot Facility
9.Total Counselling Time per Month: 120 minutes a Month Telephonic Counselling Session
10.Other Features for Interaction: Free Access to Webinars Throughout the Year, Videos, Blogs
1.Counselling Session 1: To Identify Strengths and Development Areas - Psychometric Test, Analysis Report and Individual Counseling Session

2.Counselling Session 2: Competitive Ability Mapping done Through an Onboarding Questionnaire to understand the academic ability and social environment so that the student can be counselled efficiently
3.Tracks and Options Template: Based on student’s ability the various tracks are laid out digitally
4.Time Tracker: Maps students Current and Optimized Time Management and Weekly Reports the Performance
5.Real-time Telephonic Session: 60 minutes per month (for the course of 3 months)
6.Monthly Counseling Sessions: 3 and 4 sessions in month 2 and 3 sessions with your Personal Coach
7.Free Access Webinars: For 3 months
8.Continuous Support: 24X7 Chatbot Facility
9.Performance Tracking: Via Digital Reports

1.Counselling Session 1: To Set The Course Followed By Course Correction - Psychometric Analysis of the student through a Standard Test Online and Analysis Report to identify their Strengths and Development Areas.

2.Counselling Session 2: Competitive Ability Mapping done Through an Onboarding Questionnaire to understand the academic ability and social environment so that the student can be counselled efficiently
3.Tracks and Options Template: Based on students ability the various tracks are laid out digitally
4.Our Support: 24x7 Chatbot Access For 1 month
5.More Features: 1 Month Free To Webinars
